scripts.build: ng build ngx-onesignal && npm run build.schematics
scripts.build.schematics: rm -fr dist/schematics && npx tsc -p tools/schematics/tsconfig.json && npx ts-node -P ./tools/scripts/tsconfig.json ./tools/scripts/copy.ts
scripts.sandbox.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox && git status
scripts.sandbox.link: npm link && cd sandbox/7 && npm link "ngx-onesignal" && cd ../8 && npm link "ngx-onesignal" && cd ../nx && npm link "ngx-onesignal"
scripts.sandbox.7.ng-add.local: cd sandbox/7 && ng add @angular/pwa && HAS_SANDBOX=1 ng g ngx-onesignal:ng-add --appId=XXXXXXXX-XXXX
scripts.sandbox.8.ng-add.local: cd sandbox/8 && ng add @angular/pwa && HAS_SANDBOX=1 ng g ngx-onesignal:ng-add --appId=XXXXXXXX-XXXX
scripts.sandbox.7.ng-add.universal: cd sandbox/7 && ng add @angular/pwa && ng g ngx-onesignal:ng-add --appId=XXXXXXXX-XXXX && ng add @nguniversal/express-engine --clientProject sandbox
scripts.sandbox.8.ng-add.universal: cd sandbox/8 && ng add @angular/pwa && ng g ngx-onesignal:ng-add --appId=XXXXXXXX-XXXX && ng add @nguniversal/express-engine --clientProject sandbox
scripts.sandbox.nx.ng-add.local: cd sandbox/nx && ng add @angular/pwa && HAS_SANDBOX=1 ng g ngx-onesignal:ng-add --appId=XXXXXXXX-XXXX
scripts.sandbox.test: npm run build && npm run sandbox.link && npm run sandbox.clean && npm run sandbox.pack && npm run sandbox.7.ng-add.local && npm run sandbox.8.ng-add.local && npm run sandbox.7.test:sandbox && npm run sandbox.8.test:sandbox && npm run sandbox.nx.ng-add.local && npm run sandbox.nx.test:sandbox
scripts.sandbox.7.test:sandbox: cd sandbox/7 && npm run build -- --prod && npm run lint  && npm run test -- --watch=false --progress=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCI
scripts.sandbox.8.test:sandbox: cd sandbox/8 && npm run build -- --prod && npm run lint  && npm run test -- --watch=false --progress=false --browsers=ChromeHeadlessCI
scripts.sandbox.nx.test:sandbox: cd sandbox/nx && npm run build -- --prod && npm run lint  && npm run test -- --watch=false
